test_session.test_focus: Document Tools + Text Analytics (Business Value Driven)

detailed_test_results.expected_outcome: Documents chunked and available in store
detailed_test_results.actual_outcome: Document successfully uploaded with 1 chunk, searchable and analyzable
detailed_test_results.business_value: Document is now searchable and analyzable
detailed_test_results.issues_identified: Initial test logic error - corrected (checks chunks_created not chunks_processed)

detailed_test_results.actual_outcome: Found 'Page 1' header - provides basic document navigation
Found 1 relevant chunk with actual risk content - users can search effectively

detailed_test_results.description: Generate document summary using refine method
detailed_test_results.actual_outcome: Generated 1,271 char summary with all key concepts (risk, finance, investment, uncertainty)

detailed_test_results.description: Extract and explain Risk section using map_reduce
detailed_test_results.actual_outcome: Generated 1,030 char focused extract about risk types and definitions
detailed_test_results.business_value: Users get targeted information about specific topics

detailed_test_results.actual_outcome: Content too long (1,038 chars) for 5th grade level - not accessible enough
detailed_test_results.business_value: FAILED - Not accessible enough for young learners
detailed_test_results.issues_identified: Need shorter, simpler explanations for educational use cases

critical_issues.title: Data Flow Issue - Text Analytics Blocking
critical_issues.description: Orchestrator passing list objects to tools expecting string inputs
critical_issues.error_message: string indices must be integers, not 'str'
critical_issues.impact: Text analytics tools fail when receiving search results
critical_issues.next_action: Test text analytics tools to confirm fix needed

critical_issues.title: Content Simplification Quality
critical_issues.description: Simplification tool produces content too complex for target audience
critical_issues.impact: Educational use cases not well served
critical_issues.next_action: Improve prompting for age-appropriate content generation

next_steps: Test text analytics tools to identify data flow issues
Fix orchestrator data type conversion if issues found
Improve simplification prompting for educational content

business_impact_summary.user_value_delivered: Users can upload, search, and get professional analysis of documents. Educational features need refinement.
